course_title: Academic Reading and Writing for Multilingual Students

sections.instructor: DuLaney-Greger, Keri, Prerequisite: Placement as determined by the college's multiple measures assessment process Note: ENGL-122AL is limited to 3 units for UC transfer. Note: 100% online course - no required online meetings.   Instruction will be provided through the college learning management system Canvas. On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to begin.
